TextView.android:text:
The goal of BlackJack is to have a hand value closer to 21 than that of the dealer, without going over.

 Card Values:

* An Ace = either 1 or 11.
 * 2 - 9 = their number value.
 * 10, Jack, Queen, and King = 10.


The value of the hand is the total of the numbers in your hand. For example (Jack, 3, 4 = 18).


Ace is counted as 1 only if you are going over 21 or there are two Aces in the hand.


Button Click:
 * Hit - Means you want to draw another card.
 * Stand - Means you stop at the current total.


Enjoy the Game!
